Ates the involuntary physiological processes such as your heart rate your

it's this system that reacts when you're under a physical threat the autonomic nervous system produces your fight ORF

can cause physical symptoms such as uh increased heart rate uh shortness
of breath sometimes shakiness nausea stomach
pain and if you're feeling stress or anxiety over a prolonged period of time

before you've even started something feeling detached and alone like no one's
there to help you having a very cynical mindset or feeling a lot of
self-doubt procrastinating frequently or feeling overwhelmed frequently and
